basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ My name is Roger Wells and Iâ€™m a software engineer. Before I was an engineer, I was a teacher in high schools tin Japan for about 10 years.  I enjoy design and working in CSS and Javascript. But I am very interested in data analysis and the backend, having focused on Python as my stack. One of my strengths is good communication. I love people, talking to people, and working on teams. What I try bring to the table is ownership. I believe that I should strive to do the best I can to deliver the results that I am responsible for, but I am also keen to go above and beyond whenever possible. The thing that most excites me in tech is machine learning. Being able to teach a computer to do something that we need to get done is exciting. Outside of work, I am a cyclist/photographer/audiophile.

projects.title: Terminal Development
projects.description: A collaborative project where I build a site out with 3 team mates. The site's focus is helping those new to JavaScript learn some new terms. It features randomly selected flash cards, and a test page with random questions being presented to the user.

projects.title: About Me
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I built an about-me page with some personal information and some of my personal photography. The page also features a short quiz about me to pique visitors' interest!

projects.title: salmon cookies
projects.description: A friend of mine opened a cookie shop and took it global! He asked me to build a site for him that included a sales page for employees. He asked me to sprinkle in a bit of humor, too. The site needed an updatable table to log daily global sales, which was the first time I had to build something like that. I learned a lot!
